feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-17T02:26:46.268595Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Google 正在关闭专辑存档</stitle>; <id>;https://cordcuttersnews.com/google-is-shutting-down-album-archive/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-17T01:26:22.206222Z</updated>; <link href="https://cordcuttersnews.com/google-is-shutting-down-album-archive/"/>; <author>; <name>;oidar </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oidar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cordcuttersnews.com /wp-content/uploads/2020/05/logo_Google_FullColor_3x_830x271px.max-2800x2800-1-scaled.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Google 将于 2023 年 7 月 19 日关闭 Album Archive 服务。建议用户在关闭前使用 Google Takeout 下载数据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-is-shutting-down-album-archive" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36366105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Daniel Ellsberg 去世了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/16/us/daniel-ellsberg-dead.html< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T20:26:22.302025Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/16/us/daniel-ellsberg-dead.html "/>; <author>; <name>;lgvln</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lgvln</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/03/25/multimedia/24ellsberg_3-clgz/24ellsberg_3-clgz-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px;高度：152px；" />;<br />;泄露五角大楼文件的军事分析家丹尼尔·埃尔斯伯格去世，享年92岁。五角大楼文件揭露了越战期间美国政府的谎言和欺骗。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#daniel-ellsberg-has-died" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36362042" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;人类已经抽取足够的地下水来改变地球的倾斜度</stitle>; <id>;http://68k.news/article.php?loc=US&a=https://news. google.com/rss/articles/CBMiPmh0dHBzOi8vZTM2MC55YWxlLmVkdS9kaWdlc3QvZ3JvdW5kd2F0ZXItZGVwbGV0aW9uLWVhcnRocy1heGlz0gEA?oc=5<更新>;2023-06-17T01:26: 22.333853Z</更新>; <link href="http://68k.news/article.php ?loc=US&a=https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiPmh0dHBzOi8vZTM2MC55YWxlLmVkdS9kaWdlc3QvZ3JvdW5kd2F0ZXItZGVwbGV0aW9uLWVhcnRocy1heGlz0gEA?oc=5"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sethammon s</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=sethammons</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;通过抽取地下水，人类已经改变了地球上水的分布，足以改变地球的倾斜度。此前的研究估计，在 1993 年至 2010 年间，人类抽取了超过 2 万亿吨的地下水。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#humans-have-pumped-enough-groundwater-to-change-the-tilt-of-the-earth" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36366137" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：77 岁今天推出 SaaS 平台。寻求反馈</stitle>; <id>;https://propbox.co</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T00:26:22.334638Z</updated>; <link href="https://propbox.co" />; <author>; <name>;montgomster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=montgomster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-77-year-old-launches-saas-platform-today-seeks-feedback" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36365511" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;聪明人的生产力陷阱</stitle>; <id>;https://waivek.github.io/website/tooltip.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T01:26:22.335271Z</更新>; <link href="https://waivek.github.io/website/tooltip.html"/>; <author>; <name>;cvwright</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cvwright</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;生产力是我最喜欢的话题之一，因为它一直困扰着我，尤其是在我职业生涯的早期。我会日日夜夜地工作，然后意识到我实际上只工作了 20% 的时间（例如，输入代码、调试东西、思考问题及其解决方案）。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#smart-guy-productivity-pitfalls" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36366106" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;古代宇航员理论家如何伪造印度教核爆炸</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jasoncolavito.com/the-case-of-the-false-quotes.html</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T01:26:22.335868Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.jasoncolavito.com/the-case-of-the-false-quotes.html"/>; <author>; <name>;astronads</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=astronads</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://www.jasoncolavito.com/uploads/3/7/5/9/3759274/published/6705992.jpg?1482249371" style="宽度：220px；高度：88px；" />;<br />;古代宇航员理论家认为，古代印度教文献描述了史前核爆炸。然而，他们的主张是基于对古代文献的误解和歪曲。一个例子是《摩诃婆罗多》中的一段被错误翻译和操纵以支持他们的信仰。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-ancient-astronaut-theorists-faked-a-hindu-nuclear-explosion" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36365819" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;货币定价：货币、债券、期货和互换初学者指南</stitle>; <id>;http://www.jdawiseman.com/ books/pricing-money/Pricing_Money_JDAWiseman.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:26:22.336597Z</更新>; <link href="http://www.jdawiseman.com/books/pricing-money /Pricing_Money_JDAWiseman.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mhh__</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mhh__</uri>; </author>; <content type="html "<img src="http://www.jdawiseman.com/books/pricing-money/PricingMoney_Jacket_0958x0694.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：160px；" />;<br />;$/¥ 外汇交易者真正交易的是一个数字，其中巨大的规模可以以极小的交易成本易手。股票包含许多关联性弱的数字，而固定收益则关联性很强。与其他大市场相比，固定收益具有更丰富、更复杂的结构。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pricing-money-a-beginner-s-guide-to-money-bonds-futures-and-swaps" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36358754" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;全职</stitle>; <id>;https://www.marginalia.nu/log/83_full_time/</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T14:26:22.337137Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.marginalia.nu/log/83_full_time/"/>; <作者>; <name>;kevincox</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kevincox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我今天最后一次离开办公室，这是最奇怪的感觉。我已经辞掉工作，休假，被解雇，但这与这些都不同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#full-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36356876" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;睾酮疗法和你的心脏：新研究发现风险没有增加</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/testosterone-therapy-can-be-safe-but-there- are-heart-risks-a544b8b5</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T00:26:22.340190Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/testosterone-therapy-can -be-safe-but-there-are-heart-risks-a544b8b5"/>; <author>; <name>;shaburn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=shaburn</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-801884?width=700&height=465" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px； “ />;<br />;根据一项对监管机构和医生长期关注的问题进行测试的研究，睾酮替代疗法不会增加接受适当治疗的男性患心脏病、中风或因心血管疾病死亡的风险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#testosterone-therapy-and-your-heart-new-research-finds-no-increased-risk" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36364975" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我做了一个开源的 Notion 风格的所见即所得编辑器</stitle>; <id>;https://novel. sh/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T20:26:22.340816Z</updated>; <link href="https://novel.sh/"/>; <author>; <name>;steventey</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=steventey</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Notion 是一种概念风格的所见即所得编辑器，具有 AI 驱动的自动完成功能。使用 Tiptap、OpenAI 和 Vercel AI SDK 构建。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-an-open-source-notion-style-wysywig-editor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36360789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当华为的出价变成了对企业内奸的追捕</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg。 com/news/features/2023-06-15/how-huawei-got-caught-spying-and-lost-a-200-million-5g-contract</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T00:26: 22.341353Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2023-06-15/how-huawei-got-caught-spying-and-lost-a-200-million -5g-contract"/>; <author>; <name>;NicoJuicy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=NicoJuicy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/iKMbr6.k0caQ/v0/150x-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：160px；" />;<br />;在哥本哈根的 TDC，高级管理人员是潜在的嫌疑人。公司办公室遭到入侵，人们被跟踪。然后是无人机……在 2019 年 3 月 5 日的一次匆忙安排的会议上，升级丹麦蜂窝网络的竞标出现了一些奇怪的情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-a-huawei-bid-turned-into-a-hunt-for-a-corporate-mole" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36365455" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;来自太空的宇宙辐射激增与地震直接相关</stitle>; <id>;https://www.earth. com/news/breakthrough-surges-of-cosmic-radiation-from-space-directly-linked-to-earthquakes/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T16:26:22.341975Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.earth.com/news/breakthrough-surges-of-cosmic-radiation-from-space-directly-linked-to-earthquakes/"/>; <author>; <name>;webdoodle</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=webdoodle</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cff2.earth.com/uploads /2023/06/15080136/earth_earthquake_moon_credit-IFJ_1medium-960x640.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;科学家们已经确定了全球地震活动与宇宙辐射强度变化之间的相关性，这可能有助于地震预测。 CREDO 项目旨在破译宇宙辐射波动与地震之间的联系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#surges-of-cosmic-radiation-from-space-directly-linked-to-earthquakes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36358672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gyroflow：一种开源的高级基于陀螺仪的视频稳定工具</stitle>; <id>;http://gyroflow.xyz/</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:26:22.343029Z</updated>; <link href="http://gyroflow.xyz/"/>; <author>; <name>;G4E</name>; <uri>;https //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=G4E</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://gyroflow.xyz/src/images/front_page_background.png " style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;先进的基于陀螺仪的视频稳定工具，适用于电影摄影、无人机摄影等！将您的电影镜头提升到一个新的水平。 Gyroflow 校正镜头畸变并包含一些可自定义的视频平滑算法，包括水平调平，以实现您需要的稳定外观。将陀螺仪源和相机放在一起，您就可以开始了。原生支持来自 GoPro、Insta360、Sony、Runcam、Drone blackbox 等的陀螺仪数据以及高达 16 位的视频处理。具有实时硬件加速视频播放和极速视频导出的跨平台用户界面。是的，它带有暗模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gyroflow-an-open-source-advanced-gyro-based-video-stabilization-tool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36360018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hexyl：带有彩色输出的命令行十六进制查看器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/sharkdp/hexyl </id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:26:22.343526Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/sharkdp/hexyl"/>; <author>; <name>;百瓦</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hundredwatt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ sharkdp/hexyl/master/doc/logo.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：111px；" />;<br />;Hexyl 是一个简单的终端十六进制查看器。它使用彩色输出来区分不同类别的字节。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hexyl-a-command-line-hex-viewer-with-colorized-output" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359925" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;两年的高中 CS 教学</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.charliemeyer.co/what-i-learned-from -two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T12:26:22.344018Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.charliemeyer.co /what-i-learned-from-two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs/"/>; <author>; <name>;csmeyer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=csmeyer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在过去的两年里，我与 200 多名学生一起工作，对许多人来说，我的课程是他们第一次体验编码。当我离开教学开始 Pickcode 时，我主要关心的是如何设计产品以吸引更多学生。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36355172" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;John Carmack 谈更短的工作周（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=10845832</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T18:26:22.344571Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=10845832"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“活着”是一个相当宽泛的概念。有两个因素被严重忽视：总体生活水平正在上升，而这种上升的很大一部分是由于生活低于该标准几乎是非法的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#john-carmack-on-shorter-work-weeks-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36360980" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SwiftUI 100 天</stitle>; <id>;https://www.hackingwithswift.com/100/swiftui</id>; <更新>;2023-06- 16T17:26:22.345190Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.hackingwithswift.com/100/swiftui"/>; <author>; <name>;sanketpatrikar</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=sanketpatrikar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hackingwithswift.com/uploads/100-days-of-swiftui .jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;欢迎来到 SwiftUI 100 天！这是一个包含视频、教程、测试等的免费集合，旨在帮助您有效地学习 SwiftUI。它面向想要学习构建真正的 iOS 应用程序，但难以找到可以帮助他们实现目标的优质免费课程的初学者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#100-days-of-swiftui" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36359652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;每个路易斯安那州的驾照持有人都暴露在网络攻击中</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/jun/16/louisiana-drivers-license-黑客网络攻击</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T20:26:22.345799Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/jun/16 /louisiana-drivers-license-hack-cyber-attack"/>; <author>; <name>;anigbrowl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anigbrowl</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/4dc15c160534927344ba33897821914b1e56d480/0_586_3177_1906/master/3177.jpg?width=465&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none " style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;每个持有美国路易斯安那州驾照的人的个人详细信息都暴露给了黑客，他们发动了一场大规模的网络攻击，美国联邦机构、英国航空公司和 BBC 也受到了影响。所涉及的记录数量被认为约为 600 万条。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#every-louisiana-driver-s-license-holder-exposed-in-cyberattack" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36363110" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;控制、转义和元技巧</stitle>; <id>;https://susam.net/blog/control-escape-meta-tricks .html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T19:26:22.346322Z</更新>; <link href="https://susam.net/blog/control-escape-meta-tricks.html"/>; <author>; <name>;susam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=susam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;键入 meta+b， Unix 或 Linux 终端仿真器中的 esc b 和 ctrl+[ b 都将光标向后移动一个单词。这是因为这三个键序列产生相同的输入：转义字符 (^[) 和字符 b。转义字符通过键入 ctrl+[ 获得，代码为 27。现代键盘上不再存在的 meta 键可以用 alt 或 option 代替。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#control-escape-and-meta-tricks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36353865" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;银行贷款安魂曲</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/requiem-for-a-bank-loan/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:26:22.347332Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/requiem-for-a-bank-loan/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Ozzie_osman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Ozzie_osman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.bitsaboutmoney.com/content/images/size/w2000/2023/06/patio11_requiem_for_a_bank_loan_oil_painting_09297f5f-548d-43f1-acf6-02b30a76d75b.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;最近的银行业危机给讨论银行业造成了尴尬的局面。 First Republic 的个人信贷额度是美国金融业未被充分重视的产品，它提供优惠的条件和低利率。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#requiem-for-a-bank-loan" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36359798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Miraheze 关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Board/Policies/20230615-声明</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-16T20:26:22.347816Z</updated>; <link href="https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Board/Policies/20230615-Statement"/>; <author>; <name>;tech234a</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tech234a</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Miraheze 即将关闭，这可能会扰乱长期存在的社区。董事们努力改善 Miraheze 的财务、法律和技术方面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#miraheze-to-shut-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36362547" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;芬兰计划将乏核燃料掩埋 10 万年</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230613-onkalo-has-finland-found-废核燃料废料掩埋的答案</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T16:26:22.348308Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .bbc.com/future/article/20230613-onkalo-has-finland-found-the-answer-to-spent-nuclear-fuel-waste-by-burying-it"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ychef.files.bbci .co.uk/976x549/p0ftrpky.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;芬兰即将成为第一个将废核燃料棒长期深埋地下的国家。芬兰的翁卡洛场址是世界上第一个乏核燃料永久储存场，位于奥尔基洛托岛基岩深处 450 米处。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#finland-s-plan-to-bury-spent-nuclear-fuel-for-100k-years" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36356288" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nix 为什么采用 Flakes？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jetpack.io/blog/why- did-nix-adopt-flakes/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T19:26:22.348900Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.jetpack.io/blog/why-did- nix-adopt-flakes/"/>; <author>; <name>;pushtheenvelope</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pushtheenvelope</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://res-1.cloudinary.com/jetpack-io/image/upload/q_auto/v1/blog/23_savil_photo-2.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度： 221 像素；" />;<br />;引入 Flakes 是为了解决 Nix 派生中的可组合性和标准化问题。它们提供具有标准化输入和输出的模式，以及用于固定依赖项的锁定文件。这允许在 Nix 包中获得更好的性能、可重复性和组合。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-did-nix-adopt-flakes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36362225" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;深度学习的收益递减（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/deep-learning-computational-cost</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-16T19:26:22.350369Z</updated>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/deep-learning-computational-cost"/>; <author>; <name>;jrepinc</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrepinc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media- library/a-robot-arm-being-pushed-down-by-a-very-big-dollar-icon.jpg?id=27527652&width=1200&height=1552" style="width: 220px; height: 285px;" />;<br />;深度学习是一种机器学习技术，已广泛应用于各种应用，例如语言翻译、蛋白质折叠预测、医学扫描分析和游戏。它成名是最近的事情，但它的起源可以追溯到 1958 年，当时第一个人工神经网络被设计出来。深度学习的成功归功于它的灵活性和对复杂现象建模的能力，但它的计算成本很高。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deep-learnings-diminishing-returns-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36361906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;伊利诺伊州禁止在警用无人机上使用武器和面部识别</stitle>; <id>;https://ilga.gov/legislation/fulltext.asp?DocName=&SessionId=112&GA=103&DocTypeId=HB&DocNum =3902&GAID=17&LegID=149171&SpecSess=&Session=</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T16:26:22.352320Z</更新>; <link href="https://ilga.gov/legislation/fulltext.asp?DocName =&SessionId=112&GA=103&DocTypeId=HB&DocNum=3902&GAID=17&LegID=149171&SpecSess=&Session="/>; <author>; <name>;Kon-Peki</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= Kon-Peki</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;伊利诺伊州大会的立法列表 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#illinois-prohibits-weapons-facial- recognition-on-police-drones" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359296" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟投票恢复可替换手机电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techspot.com/news/99102-european-union-votes-bring-back-replaceable-phone-batteries.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -16T19:26:22.352914Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.techspot.com/news/99102-european-union-votes-bring-back-replaceable-phone-batteries.html"/>; <author>; <name>;gumby</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gumby</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://www.techspot.com/images2/news/bigimage/2023/06/2023-06-16-image-12.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;欧盟投票赞成新立法，要求智能手机等消费设备中的电池易于拆卸和更换。此举旨在彻底改革整个电池生命周期，并提供重要的智能手机用户注意事项。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#european-union-votes-to-bring-back-replaceable-phone-batteries" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36361510" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
